about_the_game:
The Zodiac System is breaking. Only you can fix it.

Play as a young engineer named Leo and fight deadly robots on a quest to save your home planet from the sinister plans of The Stranger.



Boss fights only. Master a fluid and satisfying combat system to take down 10 increasingly difficult bosses.

Slash, shoot, and dodge your way to victory. Land melee attacks to replenish your ammo, then unleash a barrage of long-range attacks at your enemy. This short-range, long-range system infuses boss fights with a steady rhythm and keeps you in the action.

Full animation canceling and freedom of movement means you'll never lose to a cheap shot. Learn your enemy's movements and defeat them through skill.



Leo's planet is a robot-powered utopia, but not all is as it seems.

Talk with locals and discover the source of the Zodiac System's malfunctions.

Get to know a colorful and diverse cast of characters brought to life through hand-drawn portraits.





Join Leo on a globe-trotting adventure across Verge.

Treat your eyes to a beautiful pixel-art world, calling back to the classics of the 16-bit era.

Tune your ears to over a dozen tracks of pulse-pounding and nostalgia-inducing original music.

FEATURES

- 10 unique and challenging boss encounters
- A compelling sci-fi story about the cost of progress
- Responsive and fluid combat
- Pixel-perfect art style and hand-drawn characters
- Completely original soundtrack
